name: POST_whitelabel-links-id-validate
description:
**This endpoint allows you to validate a branded link.**

You can submit this request as one of your subusers if you include their ID in the `on-behalf-of` header in the request.

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

id.description: The ID of the branded link that you want to validate.

$ul: **id**: The ID of the branded link.
**valid**: Indicates if the link branding is valid.
**validation_results**: The individual validation results for each of the DNS records associated with this branded link.
**domain_cname**: The DNS record generated for the sending domain used for this branded link.
**reason**: Null if the DNS record is valid. If the DNS record is invalid, this will explain why.
**valid**: Indicates if this DNS record is valid.
**owner_cname**: The DNS record created to verify the branded link.
**reason**: Null if valid. If the DNS record is invalid, this will explain why.
**valid**: Indicates if the DNS record is valid.
**errors**: The reasons why the validation failed.
